website_summaries.verdict: A trusted name in allergy prevention continues to wow users with its efficacy and affordability. Even gentle enough for older kids and some pets.
pros: Users have given this to their dogs – with vet approval – and it works very well
Blister packs are convenient to keep in various places
Medication stays safely sealed until ready to use
Can also provide instant relief from some insect stings
cons: Some reports of drowsiness after use
May not be as effective for severe allergies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Benadryl, because you can't suffer from allergies if you're in a coma!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Parrish

customer_reviews.title: This is not from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: This product is not from the manufacturer. The label has been copied and placed on a similar bottle. The seal was broken and there was no direction paper inside the box. Fake beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: XioYara

customer_reviews.title: An amazing sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm as a sleep aid, and it's non-habit-forming. Helps me get 8 hours of sleep when I'm stressed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Benadryl Allergy Ultratabs Tablets
customer_reviews.text: I take an allergy pill everyday and I love this brand and their items but the one downside is that these make me drowsy. I need to take a nap within 30 mins to an hour. I take this at night to help with my rashes (stress & heat) before I go to bed and sleep straight through the night. I do wake up with a headache though and feel like I was run over by a truck. But as an insomniac, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: juanjune

customer_reviews.title: a superior allergy product
customer_reviews.text: For years, I used prescription Claritan D. Eventually, however, it became ineffective as well as being expensive even after it was made over-the-counter. Allegra-D turned my sinuses into a hot water faucet and made me 10 times sicker than I was to begin with. In old-fashioned Benadryl, I've found a way to effectively manage my allergies. I have been told that some people have trouble with drowsiness as result of taking Benadryl but I haven't experienced that as a side effect. In comparison to the prescription products, I have certainly had much better and more productive results with Benadryl.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rainbow-Moonchild

customer_reviews.title: Luck of the draw
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen several questions as to whether these were a bottle or blister pack. I’ve ordered them twice and received both. This last order came in 3 packages of 48 each. The time before they were in a bottle of 100. So I guess it’s just the luck of the draw. The blister packs are a better value because you get more tablets you just have to deal with the pain of getting them out of the package. I prefer the bottle myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tater4049

customer_reviews.title: These are the best non-prescription allergy pills available
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, these are the best non-pseudophedrine allergy pills available! I haven't grown 'immune' to them after 6+ years of use.
customer_reviews.author: B Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Take it every night for allergies, vertigo, and aids sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please check Expiraton date
customer_reviews.text: It is not a new, it is a product that is old and been on the shelf for awhile. The Benadryl I received has an expiration date 10/2019. I ordered it end of April 2019, so it has a shelf life of 5 months. It is misleading to sell old product. And it is non-returnable. It’s too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: 15 out of 16 orders are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this 16 times. Every time has been perfect and uneventful except the last time I purchased it. Instead of a bottle of 100 tablets, they sent me three packages of blister packs, which totaled to more than 100, but with my joints, I need the bottle. I can’t fumble around with blister packs twice a day. :( Otherwise the company has been stellar and probably would have replaced the purchase but I don’t have time to send this set back. I’ll just keep them in case of emergency situations.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo. Comes in individual pacs.
customer_reviews.text: I expected to receive the bottle with 100 tablets, the one shown on the picture that I selected. Instead, I received 3 packs of 48 tablets in individual packs. They are so hard to retrieve. The picture is misleading! Not what I wanted or was shown!
customer_reviews.author: pilot

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch on packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bottle of tablets and what I received were several packs of the ones in blister packaging with the paper and foil backing that tends not to open easily. Not what I wanted. Annoying bait and switch, likely to get rid of extra stock of the ones the in packaging everyone hates.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Work

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Pill for My Beagle
customer_reviews.text: My beagle takes prescription medications for his skin allergies and I give him 2 pills a day with his feedings to prevent him from scratching or chewing. It works most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: gariam

customer_reviews.title: Will always try to have in the house.
customer_reviews.text: We have a few people with food, medicine and bug allergies in the house. I forgot about them until I had some food fried in shrimp grease from a restaurant and didn't have any. I now keep this in my first aid kit and will try to forever keep them at the ready. They are easy to swallow and didn't take long to kick in and help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for cold and allergy symptoms
customer_reviews.text: Benadryl is a mild and benign medication that dries one's sinuses for mild colds and allergies, and makes you sleepy. This is very good stuff for taking at night before bedtime for cold and allergy symptoms with the dividend of a particularly good night's sleep. This product features 100 tablets in a bottle, which is light-years better than the flat-packs that you find at CVS and other places. Those flat-packs are hideously hard to open up to get the tablets out. What were they thinking? This is the way to buy Benadryl. I went to CVS and all they had were the flat-packs of Benadryl, which I categorically refuse to buy. So it was Amazon to the rescue. RJB.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J. BuffingtonTop Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE NOT A BOTTLE! Individual packs wrapped together!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very misleading! Based off the picture that shows a 100 count package I would assume it came in a bottle as any other 100 packs have been. Upon receiving these, they are merely individual boxes that you need to bend the corner, pull back the paper, then pop the pill out which requires using your nail to do because it’s thick foil. So not only are these in the inconvenient, individually wrapped pills, but they aren’t even the easy pop-out packs!! I would have NEVER bought these had I known these were just several packs wrapped together to total 100 ct. SO DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.author: Skm

customer_reviews.title: These really changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I've always had allergies... sometimes I sneeze, sometimes my eyes swell for days, sometimes I get a migraine. And as I got older, I discovered that I had a slightly deviated septum that caused me to snore when laying on my right side. I've also always had a hard time sleeping at night. Now I take 2 of these every night before going to bed... I sleep like a log, no snoring, and rarely do I have any allergy problems!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa&Jason

customer_reviews.title: Most Effective for my Occasional Allergic Reactions
customer_reviews.text: I find Benadryl to be the most effective over-the-counter solution for the occasional allergic reactions that I am prone to experience. I'll take two of the 25 mg tablets as soon as I detect the need, and it works quickly to counteract my symptoms. I do not feel that there are objectionable side effects, drowsiness or other, but for my own usage I only take the two tablets as needed and do not find that more is necessary, thus I am not using this on any ongoing basis.
customer_reviews.author: Phil in Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this for my dog, as his vet recommended to give him 3 benadryl tabs per day for his allergies. Benadryl at the store can be expensive when you have to use 3 tabs a day, so this is the perfect price.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara McElwaine

customer_reviews.title: You’ll sleep great.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff definitely works. I’m highly allergic to dust and pet dander (aka nearly everyone’s house). My eyes will get irritated, I get itchy skin, a scratchy throat; basically all the symptoms. When I take one of these pills, I stop feeling any of those symptoms BUT I do get so tired that the weight of my eyelids starts to feel impossibly heavy. So it’s not exactly a “perfect solution” but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: Expires soon
customer_reviews.text: The boxes I received expire in 5 months. I tired to exchange them but wasn’t able to do so. I do not recommend buying this online, it’s better going to the pharmacy and checking the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Dcs

customer_reviews.title: Works for most, IMO
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic. To this medication, obviously. EVERYTIME I use it my nose starts itching and continues till I Subdue it with ice placed directly on my nose. I have had this allergic reaction for years, not with any medicine other than this. It has usually itched with preservatives or some spice/ingredient of a food. I don’t discredit the use of this medicine as my sister has the exact opposite reaction: Susan takes it when she has creepy crawly nervous, anxiety problems and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I found that the liquid gels from benadryl work better for me. Too bad because you get a lot more of these for your money. But if you don't have absorption problems and can take tablets for your allergies, these are the ones for you.
customer_reviews.author: wilbys brat

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It's benadryl and it's cheaper than buying it in stores. What more is there to say? I've ordered this twice now and both times it's come in the bottle. Love not having to deal with the hastle and waste of the pill packs.
customer_reviews.author: Pip

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 100 count bottle, but received three 48 count blister packs. I'm not going open 144 blister packs. I'm sure I can't return these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Self

customer_reviews.title: You may be allergic to the additives in this
customer_reviews.text: This has stuff in it I was allergic to... Be careful ! Make sure you review what is in it. I can take generic from my local grocery store and pharmacy but this has stuff in it that made me very itchy and ill.. Buyer beware I am sure you do not want a trip to the ER...
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Benadryl has been a family favorite for years
customer_reviews.text: This is the closest thing and people medicine for a dog pharmaceutical that is $95 for 45 pills I might’ve got it cheaper and the drugstore what I would’ve used gas actually this works better than the doggie pharmaceuticals it’s great for allergies skin irritations etc. of course check with your vet and Arian first!
customer_reviews.author: Sara McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Good price and love that these are in a bottle (vs individually wrapped)
customer_reviews.text: Crazy allergies in Dallas TX this year has my family using this more often than not and the pills in the bottle (vs individually wrapped) is a huge help. Also great price. I compared Amazon, Walmart, Target, Walgreens.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gerwick

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my dog
customer_reviews.text: dog suffers from allergies - this is small enough to just toss into his food bowl in the morning and takes care of his allergies all day
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product
customer_reviews.text: These are small pills they swallow easily they cause no stomach upset and they function as every other type of Benadryl I purchase works.
customer_reviews.author: Thawyzard

customer_reviews.title: Great to have on hand for unexpected reactions.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have on hand for bee stings and other unexpected allergic reactions, after I had a yellow jacket sting swell up my entire foot and ankle for over a week. Pills are more handy and rugged than syrup. Haven’t used these yet but glad to have them on hand!
customer_reviews.author: SongBird

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but makes you sleepy
customer_reviews.text: Works better than other allergy medicines for certain things, and can also be used to help you go to sleep if you have insomnia :)
customer_reviews.author: Neddie

customer_reviews.title: A trusted product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Benadryl for years. I do not like the 24-hour products because they have not been effective for 24-hours, and I would have to wait before taking another. Per our vet, we also break the tabs in half for our dogs, who have allergies.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneC

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time also very satisfied, came faster than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time also very satisfied, came faster than I thought. I am happy it came so quickly I really needed it. The Ultra tabs are worth the extra money. I usually have to take 2 of the plain old regular Benadryl but 1 tab of these ultra tabs cleared me right up. You will not regret spending a little extra money for these ultra tabs, this is what I buy now. Would definitely buy from seller again. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Double check the expiration Date.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 100 Tablets and all of them expires in less than 8 months. These pills usually have long expiration date, which means I received the ones that are produced at least 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Choi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beekeepers who are slightly allergic to bees!
customer_reviews.text: Beeing a beekeeper I always keep Benadryl on hand. I do have a slight local allergy to beestings and tend to swell up badly, Benadryl helps me with the symptoms, especially when I am stung more than once....
customer_reviews.author: Bateman

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have the worst insomnia I probably take Benadryl for over 6 years i tried different brands did not work at all. With Benadryl I wake up feeling great . No sides affect so far .But is always good to discuss with your doctor first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pups!
customer_reviews.text: I gave my pups this before we went on a 7 hour car ride. They were much more relaxed on the trip and make the experience easier on the both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Laken

customer_reviews.title: Benadryl is a great allergy medicine.
customer_reviews.text: I take Benadryl mostly in the winter as the air in my house is so dry. This certainly works for me.

customer_reviews.title: and nothing worked like this. All the others were waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have used countless allergy medications ( expensive brands), and nothing worked like this. All the others were waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Take one every night and have very little allergy issues.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea to buy 100 for me.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for delivered fast, but the expiration date is Oct/2021. It used to be more than 2 yrs if buying from a retail store. I don not recommend buying 100 if someone doesn't use for a family or 3 or 4 times daily.
customer_reviews.author: sangyun sin

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have bad allergies so this deal I could not refuse. Benadryl always gives me relief and a nice nap. Pills aren’t too big, easy to swallow, no after taste.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why all of a sudden I have allergies but I do as I age, but now that I do this benadryl is a game changer for me, it helps with my symptoms. Don’t forget easy to swallow, packaging was good and you get more in the bottle.

customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's kid proof. But this is beyond that. Hard to open without it suddenly giving way and scattering pills. Bad design. I should have bought the blister pack.

customer_reviews.title: never slept better!
customer_reviews.text: My Physician suggested taking 2 tablets a half hour before bedtime to treat my insomnia. Nearly every night I do so, I sleep 8-9 hours without awakening.
customer_reviews.author: TRC

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders for anxious minds.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at first because I needed something for my terrible symptoms due to what I believed was pollen. It did it's trick for that in stopping my nose running like a faucet, but it also helped me sleep. I take it a half hour before I want to be asleep, and it keeps me asleep the whole night. It works for anxiety too, to calm your mind and your jitters so your poor body can rest.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Easy to Swallow.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow. Let's me get a great night sleep. Takes incision itching away fast.

customer_reviews.title: Benadryl works as sleep aid

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my allergies!

customer_reviews.title: Memory

I use 1 pill daily whenever I go outside since it's allergy season.

product_meta.title: Benadryl Ultratabs Antihistamine Allergy Relief Tablets, Diphenhydramine HCl 25mg, 100 ct
product_meta.description: Benadryl Allergy Ultratabs Antihistamine Allergy Relief Tablets offer effective allergy relief from hay fever, upper respiratory allergy and common cold symptoms in a small tablet size. Each antihistamine tablet contains 25 milligrams of the antihistamine diphenhydramine HCl to temporarily relieve allergy symptoms due to hay fever and upper respiratory allergies like sneezing; runny nose; itchy throat and nose; and itchy, watery eyes and the common cold symptoms of runny nose and sneezing. Benadryl Ultratabs with diphenhydramine HCl 25 mg are intended for adults and children ages six and up. The allergy tablets work when you need it most and provide multi-symptom indoor and outdoor allergy relief.
feature_bullets: 100-count pack of Benadryl Ultratabs Antihistamine Allergy Relief Tablets each containing 25 mg of the antihistamine diphenhydramine HCl for allergy relief that works when you need it most
Active ingredient, diphenhydramine HCl, provides relief for hay fever or other upper respiratory allergy symptoms and cold symptoms like sneezing and runny nose
Works when you need it most with an allergy medicine in small, convenient antihistamine tablets that put your allergies to rest
Provides allergy medicine for sneezing; runny nose; itchy nose or throat; and itchy, watery eyes and cold symptoms like sneezing and runny nose
Allergy medicine tablets for multi-symptom allergy relief intended to be used by adults and children ages six and up for relief of both indoor and outdoor allergies
